FAQs.title: FAQs

Legal.title: Legal
Legal.subtitle: Read our privacy policy, disclaimer, and terms of service

score.q: How does the app calculate my wellness score?
score.a: Your score is based on the mood and tone of your latest journal entry. We also add small bonuses for streaks and consistency.

privacy.a: Yes. Your entries are private to you and never shared with others. We use AI to generate summaries and insights, but your data is stored securely.

missDay.q: What happens if I miss a day?
missDay.a: Donâ€™t worry! Missing a day wonâ€™t erase your progress. Your consistency and streaks may reset, but you can always start fresh.

export.a: Yes, you can export your entries for backup or personal use (feature availability may depend on your subscription plan).

therapy.q: Is this a replacement for therapy?
therapy.a: No. This app is designed as a self-reflection and wellness tool. It should not replace therapy or professional mental health care.

offline.q: Can I use the app offline?
offline.a: Yes, you can write entries offline. They will sync once you reconnect to the internet.

subscription.a: You can start for free. Subscriptions unlock extra features like exporting journals and personalized insights.

resetPassword.q: How do I reset my password?
resetPassword.a: Go to Account Settings and select 'Reset Password'. Youâ€™ll receive an email with instructions.

security.a: We take security seriously. All data is encrypted and stored securely in the cloud.
